lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Other projects in this city of 12 mln people include a bridge and an extra tunnel under the Huangpu river, a new airport and passenger ship terminals and China's biggest railway station, due to open at the end of this year.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said the city was willing to use commercial loans to finance technological improvements to factories which could show a quick return in increased exports and foreign exchange earnings.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Jiang told Reuters general manager Michael Nelson that he hoped work on the railway system to ease Shanghai's transport problems would start within two years.
